document.full_text: jodie foster's wry look at depression and therapy in "the beaver" got a warm reception at the cannes film festival tuesday, hinting at a possible second life in europe after it flopped with u.s. audiences.
document.title: warm welcome at cannes for gibson's "the beaver"
lines_and_colors: jodie foster's wry look at depression and therapy in "the beaver" got a warm reception at the cannes film festival tuesday, hinting at a possible second life in europe after it flopped with u.s. audiences.
